name: DeleteErrorFingerprint
description:
Mark an error fingerprint as deleted in Datadog.

Use this tool to mark an error fingerprint as deleted in a specified Datadog project environment. This does not perform a hard delete but sets the fingerprint's status to 'deleted' using a DELETE request.

parameters.name: error_fingerprint_uuid
parameters.description: A UUID string identifying the specific error tracking issue fingerprint to be marked as deleted.

value_schema.description: A UUID string identifying this error tracking issue fingerprint v2.

parameters.name: posthog_project_id
parameters.description: The ID of the Datadog project you want to modify. Obtainable via a call to /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Datadog API.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: A UUID string identifying this error tracking issue fingerprint v2.

value_schema.description: A UUID string identifying this error tracking issue fingerprint v2.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.
